text: Joseph Desmond O'Connor (10 December 1919 – 15 July 1998) was a British linguist and Professor of Phonetics at University College London. A festschrift in his honor edited by Jack Windsor Lewis, was published by Routledge in 1995.Windsor Lewis, J. (Ed.). (1995). Studies in general and English phonetics: Essays in honour of Professor J. D. O’Connor. London, England: Routledge. ==Books== * O’Connor, J. D. (1967). Better English pronunciation (rev. 1980). Cambridge University Press * O’Connor, J. D. (1971). Advanced phonetic reader.
